event.title: Lockdown: Serfs or citizens in a connected world? LinuxCon Europe

body.p: At LinuxCon Europe in Edinburgh, Karsten Gerloff will discuss how technology is shifting power in our society, and what we need to do in order to put it where it belongs: With the citizens.
Karsten's talk will start at 16:40 in room Lammermuir 1.
